name: SOC 2 Readiness Assessment
description: Comprehensive assessment of SOC 2 Type II readiness covering all five Trust Service Criteria.

personas.name: compliance-auditor
personas.description: Expert in SOC 2 requirements and audit procedures

trust_service_criteria.name: Security (Common Criteria)
trust_service_criteria.description: Protection of system resources against unauthorized access

controls.name: Control Environment
probes: Is there a documented information security policy?
Are security roles and responsibilities defined?
Is there a security awareness training program?
Is there a code of conduct for employees?

controls.name: Communication and Information
probes: How are security policies communicated to employees?
Is there a process for reporting security incidents?
Are third-party agreements reviewed for security requirements?

controls.name: Risk Assessment
probes: Is there a formal risk assessment process?
How often are risk assessments conducted?
Are risks documented and tracked?
Is there a risk treatment plan?

controls.name: Monitoring Activities
probes: Are security controls monitored continuously?
Is there vulnerability scanning in place?
Are penetration tests conducted regularly?
How are control deficiencies remediated?

controls.name: Control Activities
probes: Is there a change management process?
Are access controls reviewed regularly?
Is there separation of duties for critical functions?
Are system configurations managed and documented?

controls.name: Logical and Physical Access
probes: Is multi-factor authentication implemented?
Are access reviews conducted periodically?
Is there a password policy?
How is physical access to data centers controlled?

controls.name: System Operations
probes: Is there an incident response plan?
Are backups performed and tested?
Is there a disaster recovery plan?
How are security events detected and logged?

controls.name: Change Management
probes: Is there a formal change management process?
Are changes tested before deployment?
Is there a rollback procedure?
Are emergency changes documented?

controls.name: Risk Mitigation
probes: Are vendors assessed for security risks?
Is there a business continuity plan?
Are insurance policies in place for cyber risks?

trust_service_criteria.name: Availability
trust_service_criteria.description: System availability for operation and use

controls.name: Availability Commitments
probes: Is there a defined SLA for system availability?
What is the target uptime percentage?
How is availability monitored?
Are there redundant systems in place?

trust_service_criteria.name: Processing Integrity
trust_service_criteria.description: System processing is complete, valid, accurate, and timely

controls.name: Processing Integrity Commitments
probes: Are data validation controls in place?
How are processing errors detected and corrected?
Is there audit logging for data modifications?
Are data quality checks performed?

trust_service_criteria.name: Confidentiality
trust_service_criteria.description: Information designated as confidential is protected

controls.name: Confidentiality Commitments
probes: Is data classified by sensitivity level?
Is encryption used for data at rest and in transit?
Are there data handling procedures for confidential information?
How is confidential data disposed of?

trust_service_criteria.name: Privacy
trust_service_criteria.description: Personal information is collected, used, retained, and disposed of properly

controls.name: Privacy Commitments
probes: Is there a privacy policy?
Are privacy notices provided to data subjects?
Can individuals access and correct their data?
Is consent obtained for data collection?
Are data retention periods defined?
